| Overview                = The '''Cherubim''' are the ninth choir of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]] per their hierarchy in [[Judaism]], and a choir of the [[First Sphere]] per [[Christianity]], along with the [[Seraphim (Angels) (Earth-616)|Seraphim]] and the [[Council of Thrones (Earth-616)|Thrones]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}

The Cherubim seemingly associated themselves with the Seraphim among [[Seraphim and Cherubim, Inc. (Earth-616)|Seraphim and Cherubim, Inc.]].{{r|Bizarre Adventures #34}}
